analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xf1134c85f869a873ab665e0d3ab480fa575c8ac7.sol:
	Contract CreateDAZToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xf1134c85f869a873ab665e0d3ab480fa575c8ac7.sol#217-218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xf1134c85f869a873ab665e0d3ab480fa575c8ac7.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
